placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
context: Use in context of: Погрузитесь в осеннюю сказку Тайланда!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.

emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing the beaches and warm sunset colors, aligning perfectly with the campaign's adventurous and exotic tone.". fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
